description: FastAPI router module exposing the /api/chat POST endpoint for chat interactions with an AI assistant. Defines the endpoint, request/response models, and error handling.

methods.name: ChatResponse chat_endpoint( payload: ChatRequest, session_id: str = Depends(deps.get_session_id), x_session_id_raw: str | None = Header(default=None, alias="X-Session-ID"), )
methods.description: Defines the POST /chat endpoint, handles chat requests, validations, and calls the chat service for processing.

ctags.name: chat_endpoint
ctags.signature: ( payload: ChatRequest, session_id: str = Depends(deps.get_session_id), x_session_id_raw: str | None = Header(default=None, alias="X-Session-ID"), )
